original: jale bruḍati naivāyaṃ duḥśakyo hi parīkṣitum // Rsdhy_296*[195] //
analyzed: jale bruḍati nā eva ayam duḥśakyaḥ hi parīkṣitum

original: līlakaṃ hastayoḥ kṣiptvā hīrakānāṃ ca viṃśatiḥ /
analyzed: līlakam hastayoḥ kṣiptvā hīrakānām ca viṃśatiḥ

original: hastābhyāṃ mardanīyāste na syur nistejasaśca ye // Rsdhy_297*[196] //
analyzed: hastābhyām mardanīyāḥ te na syuḥ nistejasaḥ ca ye

original: yeṣvekā na bhavedrekhā te jātyā hīrakāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: yeṣu ekā na bhavet rekhā te jātyāḥ hīrakāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: karparaṃ pakvam ānīya gartāḥ kāryāstvanekaśaḥ // Rsdhy_298*[197] //
analyzed: karparam pakvam ānīya gartāḥ kāryāḥ tu anekaśas
jātya hīrān kṣipet teṣu tatas tu mṛta jīvibhiḥ

original: dhmātvā dhmātvā śikhivarṇaṃ kāryaṃ tajjñaiśca karparam // Rsdhy_299*[198] //
analyzed: dhmātvā dhmātvā śikhi varṇam kāryam tad jñaiḥ ca karparam
nṛ mūtram thauharam dugdham tulyam ekatra miśritam

original: tābhyāṃ vidhyāpayed dhmātaṃ karparaṃ ca muhurmuhuḥ // Rsdhy_300*[199] //
analyzed: tābhyām dhmātam karparam ca muhur muhur
karpareṣu navīneṣu gartān kṛtvā atha hīrakān

original: tāneva dhmāpayet kṣiptvā dhmātān miśreṇa chaṇṭayet // Rsdhy_301*[200] //
analyzed: tān eva dhmāpayet kṣiptvā dhmātān miśreṇa chaṇṭayet
yuktyā anayā sapta vāram dhmātvā

original: tādṛśāḥ prathame dhmāne jāmbulāḥ syur dvitīyake // Rsdhy_302*[201] //
analyzed: tādṛśāḥ prathame dhmāne jāmbulāḥ syuḥ dvitīyake
